metadata.title: USN-4605-1 -- Blueman vulnerability
metadata.description: Vaisha Bernard discovered that blueman did not properly sanitize input on  the d-bus interface to blueman-mechanism. A local attacker could possibly  use this issue to escalate privileges and run arbitrary code or cause a  denial of service. (CVE-2020-15238)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4605-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  blueman - 2.0.5-1ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
